page.title: 01WELCOME TO OUR D-BLOCK.
page.content: Our D-Block is mainly an agricultural area of{farmlands}and{fields,}which grow{wheat}and{barley.}There is also a main road crossing the corner of our D-Block which has a{snack-bar}called the{"O.K.Cafe."}Most of the houses in our D-Block are in{Easthorpe.}Also there is a{church}which was built in the 12th century,as well as a{pub called{"The House Without a Name".}On the east side of the church is the {church hall}which was once a{school. Sometimes there are a few events throughout the year which include{ {Balloon racing,point to point {horse racing}and{scrambling.}There is also a wood called{Fan wood.}There are three mansions called{Prested Hall, {St.Marys Grange}and{Easthorpe Hall. Part of the area used to be an{ {Airfield. }
